Herb.Name: Argsbaries
Herb.Effect: Af 7. Level 4 antidote for muscle poisons.

Herb.Name: Eldaanna
Herb.Effect: AF 2. Lvl 9 antidote for reduction poisons. Reverses the effect of the curse of the Ugliness of Orn {chan. Curses lvl 5}

Herb.Name: Menelar
Herb.Effect: AF 4. Lvl 7 antidote for Circulatory poisons.

Herb.Name: Mook
Herb.Effect: AF 5. Lvl 5 antidote for Respitory Poisons

Herb.Name: Quilmufur
Herb.Effect: AF 1. Lvl 8 antidote for Conversion Poisons.

Herb.Name: Shen
Herb.Effect: AF 3. Lvl 4 antidote for Nerve Poisons.

Herb.Name: Ul-Naza
Herb.Effect: Af 9. Lvl 50 antidote for any poison. Must be taken within one day of poisoning.

Herb.Name: Culan
Herb.Effect: Anti-spasmodic; reduces effect of certain poisons.

Herb.Name: Eledil's Basket
Herb.Effect: Purifies water. Slows poisons 10x. Lasts 12hrs. 1 dose/day only.

Herb.Name: Himros
Herb.Effect: Relieves Pangwood inflammation. Cures up to 2nd degree burns.

Herb.Name: Klandun
Herb.Effect: Cures Thrayniis and other forms of paralysis.

Herb.Name: Arfandas
Herb.Effect: AF 1. Doubles rate of healingfor fractures

Herb.Name: Alambas
Herb.Effect: Af 4. Heals 4 square inches of any type burn.

Herb.Name: Aloe
Herb.Effect: AF 0. Doubles healing rate for burns and minor cuts. Heals 5 hits if they resulted from burns.

Herb.Name: Culkas
Herb.Effect: AF 0. Heals 10 square feet of burns (any type).

Herb.Name: Jojojopo
Herb.Effect: AF 0. Cures Frostbite. Heals 2-20 hits resulting from cold.

Herb.Name: Kelventari
Herb.Effect: AF0 Heals 1st and 2nd degree burns. 1-10 hits resulting from heat.

Herb.Name: Veldurak
Herb.Effect: AF2 Cures frostbite. Heals 1-50 hits resulting from cold.

Herb.Name: Vessin
Herb.Effect: Cures 2nd degree (seconds) and 3rd degree (1 day) burns.

Herb.Name: Anserke
Herb.Effect: AF7Stops bleeding by clotting and sealing wound. Takes 3 rds to take effect. Patient cannot move without wound reopening.

Herb.Name: Fek
Herb.Effect: AF5 Stops any bleeding. Takes 1-10 rds to take effect. Patient cannot move (much) without wound reopening.

Herb.Name: Harfy
Herb.Effect: AF9 Immediately stops any form of bleeding.

Herb.Name: Hugburtun
Herb.Effect: AF6 Immediately stops any form of bleeding.

Herb.Name: Miretar'sCrown
Herb.Effect: Stops bleeding of any one wound.

Herb.Name: Draaf
Herb.Effect: AF1 Heals 1-10 for each of 2 consecutive rds.

Herb.Name: Arkasu
Herb.Effect: AF2 Heals 2-12 hits. Doubles rate of healing for major wounds.

Herb.Name: Arlan
Herb.Effect: AF3 Decongestant. +20 to resistance vs common cold. Speeds recovery from respitory illness by 5x.

Herb.Name: Athelas
Herb.Effect: AF20 Capable of curing anything while patient still alive but healing only as effective as the healer. Full effect only in hands of an ordained king. Will not keep or give life.

Herb.Name: Carneyar
Herb.Effect: Heals all hits and stops bleeding.

Herb.Name: Delrean
Herb.Effect: AF1Repels any insect. Smells foul(noticeably so; range 50')

Herb.Name: Felmather
Herb.Effect: AF15Mental summons of one friend (beasts or folk). Range 300'x user's level. Coma relief.

Herb.Name: Fukavar
Herb.Effect: Allows mental summons one friendly individual. Range 20 miles.

Herb.Name: Latha
Herb.Effect: AF4.+10 to disease resistance cures comon cold. Heals 1-2 hits.

Herb.Name: Trudurs
Herb.Effect: AF8+10 to disease resistance for 1-10 days.

Herb.Name: Laurelin
Herb.Effect: AF21Lifegiving for Elves if given within 28 days of death.

Herb.Name: Nur-oiolosse
Herb.Effect: AF13Lifegiving (1 day). Kills one day later unless Sorul nut (c-F-2; 1 sp) is ingested.

Herb.Name: Oiolosse
Herb.Effect: AF22(Ololosse). Lifegiving for elves if given within 7 days of death.

Herb.Name: Arnuminas
Herb.Effect: AF8Doubles rate of healing for sprains torn ligaments and cartilage damage.

Herb.Name: Terbas
Herb.Effect: AF4Doubles healing rate for nerve damage.

Herb.Name: Berterin
Herb.Effect: AF20Preservation of organic material (up to body size) for one day.

Herb.Name: Siran
Herb.Effect: AF31Resoration of 1 organ or area. Side effect: skin disease (Pr 10% normal) and 6 hits per rd when skin exposed to full sun.

Herb.Name: Siriena
Herb.Effect: AF27Preservation of any organic material (up to body size). Lasts 1 week.

Herb.Name: Tarnas
Herb.Effect: AF60lNausea for 1-10 hrs (-50). Repairs organ damage.

Herb.Name: Agaath
Herb.Effect: AF3Breathe with low oxygen (25% +) 12 hrs. Once per to days.

Herb.Name: Ankii
Herb.Effect: Decongestant. +20 to resistance vs common cold. Speeds recovery from respitory illness by 5x.

Herb.Name: Atigax
Herb.Effect: AF12Protects eyes in intense light or glare. Allows sight despite sudden or blinding light. Lasts 9 hrs.

Herb.Name: Breldiar
Herb.Effect: AF7Subtracts 30 from maneuver and melee. Adds 50 to spells and missile attacks. Euphoria. Lasts 1 hr.

Herb.Name: Blue Eyes
Herb.Effect: AF25Enhanced visioin (x3 range) plus mild infravision (min 50') for 3 hrs. 1x/day.

Herb.Name: Elben's Basket
Herb.Effect: AF15Heart stimulant. Doubles speed for 1 rd once per hour.

Herb.Name: Gylvir
Herb.Effect: AF20Allows one to breathe under water (only) for 4 hrs.

Herb.Name: Grapeleaf
Herb.Effect: AF18Intoxication and dreams (actions at -50) for 2 hours 1 days nutrition.

Herb.Name: Joef
Herb.Effect: AF23Allows mental summons of one known sentient friend (100'x level of user).

Herb.Name: Kathkusa
Herb.Effect: AF352x strength (1-10 rds). 2x hits given foes; +10 OB.

Herb.Name: Kilmakur
Herb.Effect: AF33Protects versus flame and heat for 1-10 hrs.

Herb.Name: Klagul
Herb.Effect: AF7Infravision (6 hrs). One sees as an Elf.

Herb.Name: Megillos
Herb.Effect: AF19Increases visual perception (2x range) for 10 minutes.

Herb.Name: Rud-tekma
Herb.Effect: AF10Bonus of +20 when casting spells or for over-cast attempts. Lasts 1 hr. Maneuver and melee bonus -20. 10% chance any spell will be cast on nearest unintended target.

Herb.Name: Splayfoot
Herb.Effect: AF16For good in heart instills confidence and singleness of purpose (+25) for 1 to 4 hours.

Herb.Name: Yaran
Herb.Effect: AF7Acute smell and taste (+50) for 1 hr.

Herb.Name: Zur
Herb.Effect: AF8Enhances smell and hearing (3x range; +50 man.). Lasts 1 hr.

Herb.Name: Lestagii
Herb.Effect: AF45Restores any stat losses other than those due to age. Affects only 1 stat.

Herb.Name: Merrig
Herb.Effect: (AF50)Daily use increases Pr by 5. Interruption of use will not reverse addictive resistance but means loss of benefit. Withdrawal means loss of 10 from Co 15 from Re and Me.

Herb.Name: Alshana
Herb.Effect: AF5Does/4 oz slice. Infravision (min. 300') for 1 hr. 10-slice load 290gp. Tastes of raisins and carrots; keeps 1-2 months.

Herb.Name: Cram
Herb.Effect: AF1Dose/4 oz slice. Dwarven Waybread. Five day's nutrition/slice. 10-slice load 13gp. Tastes of mushrooms and pepper; keeps 7 weeks.

Herb.Name: Hesguratu
Herb.Effect: AF10Dose/4 oz slice. 2x strength (6 rds); +10 OB and 2x hits given foes. 10-slice load 350gp. Tastes of wheat and onions keeps 1 month

Herb.Name: Kykykyl
Herb.Effect: AF6Dose/4 oz slice. Allows one to see with complete clarity (as on a cloudless day) for 1 hr regardless of weather lighting or eye injuries (unless eye destroyed) 10-slice load 440gp. Tastes of garlic carrots and ginger; keeps 2-20 weeks.

Herb.Name: Tatharsul
Herb.Effect: AF15Dose/4 oz slice. Restores nervous system to normal (in 1 to 10 rds). 10-slice load 690gp. Tastes of pumpkin and lemon; keeps 1-2 months.

Herb.Name: Ulginor
Herb.Effect: AF0Dose/4 oz slice. A slice provides a day's nutrition. 10-slice load 35sp. Tastes of cheese and spinach; keeps 1-2 months.

Herb.Name: Arunya
Herb.Effect: AF50Causes sleep and quick unconsciousness. Olne hour's sleep equals 4.

Herb.Name: Brorkwilb
Herb.Effect: AF45Euphoric. Allows for shared dreams with family member who lies within range (100 miles x level of user).

Herb.Name: Galenas
Herb.Effect: AF10Leaf produces smoke which affects 20' rad. Relaxes (-75) 1-10 rds.

Herb.Name: Gort
Herb.Effect: AF20Euphoric hallucinogin. +10 to user's Pr for 2 hrs but afterwards causes user to be at -50 for 1-10 hrs.

Herb.Name: Hoak-foer
Herb.Effect: AF30Hallucinogin. Cures mind loss and mental diseases but prevents movement (altogether) for 1-10 weeks.

Herb.Name: Hugar
Herb.Effect: AF33Causes sleep and quick unconsciousness. One hour's sleep equals 6.

Herb.Name: Nelisse
Herb.Effect: AF15Euphoria (-50) for 1 hr. Yields 1 day's nutrition.

Herb.Name: Swigmakril
Herb.Effect: AF25Relaxant. User takes 2x usual hits before passing out (but dies due to hits at usual #) although he operates at -30. Lasts 1-2 hrs.

Herb.Name: Takamur
Herb.Effect: AF100Euphoric. Allows for shared dreams with friend similarly affected lies within range (50 miles x level of user).

Herb.Name: Carnegurth
Herb.Effect: Reddish juice causes massive blood clotting and death in 1-100 hrs.

Herb.Name: Karfar
Herb.Effect: Reddish paste causes heart to shut down. Massive shock and death in 2-12 rds.

Herb.Name: Sharduvaak
Herb.Effect: Brown liquid slows blood flow. Victim sluggish and at -50 for all activity and needs 2x usual sleep.

Herb.Name: Bragolith
Herb.Effect: Bluish juice causes victim to spontaneously combust. Phosphorescent green firefly juice

Herb.Name: Brithagurth
Herb.Effect: Black venom causes hardening of tendons in 1-4 appendages (making them useless).

Herb.Name: Henuial
Herb.Effect: Yellow venom converts optic juices of 1-2 eyes to honey

Herb.Name: Ondokamba
Herb.Effect: Green venom turns (1-4) hands and/ or feet to stone (making each affected area -75).

Herb.Name: Muilfana
Herb.Effect: Orange tree sap. When contacted with mucous membranes turns to acid (blinds or destroys windpipe and/or esophagus).

Herb.Name: Taynaga
Herb.Effect: Browinish powder sterilizes and gives 5-50 hits.

Herb.Name: Dynallca
Herb.Effect: Tan paste destroys hearing and gives 1-10 hits.

Herb.Name: Kaktu
Herb.Effect: Affects 1-4 appendages. Dexterity loss in each affected area reduces associated maneuver rolls by 1-100 (avg. if two are used).

Herb.Name: Trusa
Herb.Effect: Acts in 1-10 rds. Victim failing RR by 21+ is killed. Victim failing by 11-20 falls into coma and is blind; failure by 1-10 results in blindness in 1-2 eyes.

Herb.Name: Acaana
Herb.Effect: Black paste destroys nervous system. Kills instantly.

Herb.Name: Asgurash
Herb.Effect: Brownish red snake venom. Upper body paralysis.

Herb.Name: Cathaana
Herb.Effect: White powder instantly causes mild euphoria (victim at -50 for 1-10 rds). Brain is destroyed after 1-10 minutes.

Herb.Name: Ruth-i-laur
Herb.Effect: Brownish Cave-drake saliva causes rapid (1-20 rds) erosion of nervous system. Victim left at -50 to -100 activity.

Herb.Name: Slird
Herb.Effect: Acts in 1-2 rds. Victim loses feeling in 1-6 extremities (head genitals hands feet) for 1-100 days.

Herb.Name: Ul-acaana
Herb.Effect: Nervous system destroyed. Paralyzes instantly; kills in 1-10 minutes.

Herb.Name: Wek-baas
Herb.Effect: Acts in 1-100 rds RR failure of 31+ results in total paralysis; failure by 16-30 results in degeneration of balance and hearing in 1-10 days; RR failure of 1-15 results in sleep.

Herb.Name: Lhugruth
Herb.Effect: Grey/black blood rapidly (1-10 rds) dissolves inflicted area. Affects metals and organic material. Does not affect glass/ sand/ pottery.

Herb.Name: Ondohithui
Herb.Effect: Blue/grey paste causes fatal dehydration in 1-10 minutes.

Herb.Name: Nimnaur
Herb.Effect: Milky white juices slowly (1-10 minutes) liquifies affected organ (1 organ/dose).

Herb.Name: Silmaana
Herb.Effect: Silver powder scars skin; gives 2-20 hits.

Herb.Name: Slota
Herb.Effect: Slow (1 day) paralysis and death (1-10 days).

Herb.Name: Zaganzar
Herb.Effect: Bluish extract blinds by reducing optic nerve to water; gives 1-10 hits.

Herb.Name: Galenaana
Herb.Effect: Green powder kills Elves; leaves others in a coma for 1-100 weeks.

Herb.Name: Hith-i-Girith
Herb.Effect: Mist/ vapor from live (active) tree acts as depressant causing immediate and continuing sleep.

Herb.Name: Jitsutyr
Herb.Effect: Tan paste destroys lungs and kills in 1-100 rounds.

Herb.Name: Adder Venom
Herb.Effect: >Minimum<Causes paralysis (1-100 rounds)>Maximum< Death with in 5 rounds

Herb.Name: Ajkara
Herb.Effect: >Minimum< disorient (-10% to all actions 1-10 hrs)>Maximum<target reveals secrets

Herb.Name: Angurth
Herb.Effect: >Minimum<Fever and nausea 2 to 20 rounds>Maximum<slow painful death

Herb.Name: Blade Hemlock
Herb.Effect: >Minimum<incapacity between 1 to 10 hours>Maximum<kills within 1 to 6 rounds

Herb.Name: Cyclic Fever
Herb.Effect: >Minimum<2-3 cycles of low grade fever>Maximum<3-12 cycles of fever lasting 4 dayscyclic fever causes blindness(50%) or death (25%)

Herb.Name: Din Fuinen
Herb.Effect: >Minimum<disorient -30% for 1 to 10 hrs>Maximum<amnesia for 1 to 100 days

Herb.Name: Gurth-nu-fuin
Herb.Effect: >Minimum<severs nausea from1 to 100 hours>Maximum<slow painful death

Herb.Name: Marsh Flux
Herb.Effect: >Minimum<diarrhea and vomitting for 1 to 3 days>Maximum<dehydrate/coma 2 to 7 days. with a 20% chance of death.

Herb.Name: M.W. Trumpet
Herb.Effect: >Minimum<headache (at -15%) for 1 to 10 hours>Maximum<nausea (for 1 to 100 days) or insanity

Herb.Name: Murnan
Herb.Effect: For Non-Elves Only>Minimum<fever and delerium last four days>Maximum<paralysis

Herb.Name: Pangwood
Herb.Effect: >Minimum<none>Maximum<Unshakable feelings of doom and hopelessness.-15 to all actions.

Herb.Name: Pentanoth
Herb.Effect: >Minimum<loss of will for 6 to 12 hours>Maximum<coma for 1 to 4 days

Herb.Name: Phoroz
Herb.Effect: >Minimum<numb limbs at -40 for 1 to 10 hours>Maximum<slow paralysis & death

Herb.Name: Quaking Fever
Herb.Effect: >Minimum<swelling/fever/trembling>Maximum<fever/convultions/cough for 6 to 10 days.30% chance loss (1-20pts) Co.15% chance of death

Herb.Name: Red Fever
Herb.Effect: >Minimum<fever/nosebleeds/headache 7 to 10 days.vs skin -50% for 6 to 60 hrs.vs. eyes blindness.vs.lungs choke to death in agony>Maximum<vomitting for 10 to 14 days40% chance of death from pneumonia or peritonitis or meningitis or heart failure.

Herb.Name: Spider Venom
Herb.Effect: >Minimum<fever/delerium lasts 10 to 100 hours>Maximum<death or paralysis(2 types)

Herb.Name: Water Hemlock
Herb.Effect: >Minimum<incapacity for 1 to 10 hours>Maximum<kills in 6 to 10 rounds

Herb.Name: Yavin Girith
Herb.Effect: >Minimum<dizziness for 1 to 10 days at -25%>Maximum<mild coma/memory loss

Herb.Name: Yellow Rheum
Herb.Effect: >Minimum<vomit/jaundice/fever>Maximum<bloody vomit for 7 to 18 days with 20% chance of death
